basics.name: Martin Sosa
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.personalSummary: Passionate and tech-savvy Full Stack Developer with a keen eye for detail. Enthusiastic learner who thrives on daily acquisition of new skills and knowledge. Specializes in modern web development, with experience in React, TypeScript, and Next.js, while remaining open to exploring and adapting to other technologies. Proficient in crafting responsive and visually appealing interfaces using Tailwind CSS. Combines strong technical skills with a deep love for technology to deliver innovative solutions. Committed to staying at the forefront of web development trends and best practices.

work.name: Northland Waste Management
work.summary: Developed and enhanced products using React, Redux, and TypeScript, contributing innovative solutions to team projects. Demonstrated technical expertise in electronics, including routers, switches, relay modules, and Raspberry Pi, while consistently delivering impactful results that advanced business objectives. Maintained a collaborative, open-minded approach, fostering teamwork and creativity.

work.name: AGCO
work.summary: Managed efficient warehouse operations, overseeing goods flow from overseas suppliers to customers. Responsibilities included quality control of received goods, SAP system integration for accurate inventory management, order fulfillment and dispatch, logistics coordination with transport companies, administrative duties, and safe forklift operation. Ensured timely deliveries, maintained high customer satisfaction, and upheld industry compliance standards.

education.educationDetail: Through this intensive bootcamp, I gained robust web development skills, particularly in the React and Node.js ecosystems. The program fostered excellent self-learning habits, significantly enhancing my ability to acquire new skills independently. This experience has been instrumental in shaping my approach to continuous learning and problem-solving in the tech industry.
